articles.title: iPhones’ cheaper range: iPhone SE 3, iPhone 12S Pro may start from Rs 35,000 - Free Press Journal
articles.content: Apple will be rolling out iPhone SE 3 and iPhone 12S Pro soon. It is reported that iPhone SE 3 will be priced at USD 499 (around Rs 36,400). Meanwhile, the iPhone SE 3 price in India is expected to b… [+866 chars]

articles.author: Rishi Iyengar, CNN Business
articles.title: Google will stop making video games for its Stadia platform - CNN
articles.description: Google will stop making video games, less than two years after launching its highly publicized Stadia gaming platform.
